Feature Notes:
Healer: Using healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 HP; healer's kit heals 1d6 + 4 + target HD HP 1/short rest
Inspiring Leader: R30' 10-min speech gives 6 allies 14 temporary HP
Keen Mind: Always know direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset; recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Linguist: Create ciphers that require a DC 21 Int check to decode
Lucky: Adv on attack, ability, or saving throw or foe Disadv on self attack 3/long rest
Observant: Read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: Receive aid from temples of Greek-Apollo and fellow believers

Weapon Master: Weapon Proficiency (Choose 4 from any)
Action Surge: Take an extra action 1/short rest
Charger: After dash, bonus attack inflicts +5 HP damage or bonus 10' push
Combat Superiority: Use 1d6 Superiority Dice to perform 2 chosen Maneuvers/short rest
Crossbow Expert: Quick load; no Disadv on close shot; bonus hand crossbow shot after one-handed attack
Defensive Duelist: Use Reaction for +4 AC when holding finesse weapon
Distracting Strike: Add Superiority Die to damage, next ally attack against same foe in same rd gains Adv
Dual Wielder: +1 AC w/two weapons; use two-weapon fighting w/any one-handed weapons; draw or stow two weapons at once
Durable: Minimum 2 when regaining HP
Fighting Style (Protection): Use Reaction to impose attack Disadv on adjacent foe attacking ally
Grappler: Adv on attacks on grappled foe; additional grapple to pin
Great Weapon Master: Bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP; trade -5 attack w/heavy weapon for +10 damage
Heavy Armor Master: DR 3/magic to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Improved Critical: Crit on natural 19
Lunging Attack: Gain +5' melee range, add Superiority Die to damage
Mage Slayer: Use Reaction to attack adjacent caster; foe Disadv on concentration to maintain spell
Mobile: Dash at full speed in difficult terrain, no OA from targeted foe
Mounted Combatant: Adv on melee attacks on unmounted foe smaller than mount, redirect attack on mount to self, mount takes no damage on Dex save, half on fail
Polearm Master: Bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning, OA when foe enters reach
Savage Attacker: Take best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Second Wind: Regain 1d10+10 HP 1/short rest
Sentinel: OA strike halts foe; OA on adjacent foe Disengage; use Reaction to attack when adjacent foe targets other
Sharpshooter: No Disadv on attacks at long range, ignore 3/4 cover, trade -5 attack w/ranged weapon for +10 damage
Shield Master: Bonus Push during Attack
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength

Save Notes:
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Dungeon Delver: Adv on trap detection and avoidance and resistance to trap damage
Indomitable: May re-roll failed save 1/long rest
Mage Slayer: Adv on spells by adjacent foes
Shield Master: +2 Dex vs. targeted spell, Dex save yields no damage instead of half

Spells:
Blade Ward (B0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 rd
Fire Bolt (S0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 1d10 HP fire
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc or 1 min
Hellish Rebuke (K1 Evoc): R60' Use Reaction to inflict 2d10 HP fire on successful attacker (Dex half)
Heroism (B1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +4 temporary HP each rd for conc or 1 min
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Jump (S1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr
Mage Hand (B0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Mage Hand (K0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target have whispered conversation for 1 rd
Minor Illusion (K0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights 10' radius for 10 min, self can make ranged spell attack inflicting 2d8 HP
Purify Food And Drink (C1 Tran): R10' Food and drink in 5' radius freed of poison and disease
Ray Of Frost (W0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc or 1 min
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 2d8 HP lightning
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Know 2 B0 spells, cast 1 B1 spell/long rest
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Know 2 C0 spells, cast 1 C1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Druid): Know 2 D0 spells, cast 1 D1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Know 2 S0 spells, cast 1 S1 spell/long rest
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Know 2 K0 spells, cast 1 K1 spell/long rest
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
